HP LaserJet 1000 on OS X Mavericks

HP LaserJet 1000 is an old model that is not supported on Mac OS X. However, using foo2zjs printer driver it is possible to configure OS X Mavericks (as well as Snow Leopard, Lion, and Mountain Lion) to support HP LaserJet 1000.
